content: HIT-Glass Mixer attachment Nozzle accessory for injecting HIT-HY 270 mortar for glass balustrade applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Glass balustrade installation ### FEATURES:Features Simplify glass balustrade applications - nozzle mixer attachment injects and spreads the HIT-HY 270 mortar to form a u-shaped mortar puck for faster and higher-quality installations Enhanced safety – the HIT-RE 60 Glass mixer attachment enables mortar injection from the inner side of the glass pane, eliminating the risk associated with working on the exposed side of glass-panels at heights Higher productivity - quickly inject the pre-mixed mortar into glass centralizers in seconds, freeing up time and resources Minimize mortar waste - when used with glass centralizers, the HIT-RE 60 Glass mixer attachment helps inject an optimized amount of mortar for fastening, reducing materials required for glass balustrade installation Applications Ideal for serial installation of glass panels into metal shoes Fastening glass panes for internal and external glass balustrades and handrails Fastening glass panes on curved and vertically inclined surfaces (up to 35°) in glass balustrade applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2395776 - Glass Handrail Flat Nozzle - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT-Glass 60x120mm Nozzle - 2433316 - Spatula (thin) mixer nozzle 60-Hit-Glass - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT-Glass 60x150 Nozzle assy
